comments.html: All I can say is: thank you!
comments.name: Pere

comments.html:
All I would like to say Ivan is " Thank You very much " for your materials and efforts over the years. You took a very different approach for educating people as compared to becoming just another popular vendor training house.

I am sure many engineers will always have this in their mind including myself that You played a crucial role in their career success as Network Engineer.
comments.name: A Tech Artist
